chapters.title: Chapter 6:  The Hunt Begins
chapters.info: Ishamael, p. 91 (66)—Most powerful of the Forsaken. His name means “Betrayer of Hope.” He is known by another name among the Trollocs, as well as among Darkfriends: Ba'alzamon, “Heart of the Dark.” Most people believe that Ba'alzamon is the Dark One, and Ishamael seems to have no problem with them thinking this. See also Ba'alzamon; Shai'tan.
